scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[urinamevar]@[local_ip]:5099 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Aparty" <sip:972507000118@sippmysipdomain.com;user=phone>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "Bparty" <tel:+972000001> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:972507000118@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: generic_test_sip P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-E-UTRAN-FDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=4250318cf0201e11 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=MG4000|2.0 291244 581952 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 18 98 97 96 115 117 101 a=rtpmap:98 G.729a/8000 a=rtpmap:97 G.729b/8000 a=rtpmap:96 G.729ab/8000 a=rtpmap:115 GSM-EFR/8000 a=rtpmap:117 AMR/8000 a=fmtp:117 mode-set=7; octet-align=1 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=ptime:10 a=X-vrzcap:vbd Ver=1 Mode=FaxPr ModemRtpRed=0 a=X-vrzcap:identification bin=DSR2581 Prot=mgcp App=MG

ACK sip:972000001@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Aparty" <tel:+9729999999>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "Bparty" <tel:+972000001>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:972507000118@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: generic_test_sip Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:HP-NGIN@dc02labtas01:5060;transport=udp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Aparty" <tel:+9729999999>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "Bparty" <tel:+972000001>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Route: <sip:10.20.110.19;lr;ftag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number]> Contact: <sip:972507000118@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: generic_test_sip Content-Length: 0
